    // in Hz, see "common" tab
    float frequency;
    // offset - time in seconds when to start playing note
    float offset;
    // duration of a note (1/4, 1/8, ...), see "common" tab
    float duration;
};

float Weight( float x )
{  if( x < 0.0 )x = - x;
	if( x < 1.0 )return (1.0 - 2.0*x*x + x*x*x) ;
	if( x < 2.0 )return (4.0 - 8.*x + 5.*x*x - x*x*x) ;
return 0.0 ;
}


float saw(float t, float note, float octave)
{   return fract(t*note*exp2(octave-1.))-0.5; }


vec2 noteFreq(Note note, float time) 
{
    float octava=3.0;
    float n1=saw(time,note.frequency, octava)* exp(-1.0/note.duration * (time - note.offset));  ///ORIGINAL
    float t=time;
    n1=Weight(n1)*n1;    
    return vec2(n1);
}

vec2 mainSound( in int samp,float time) 
{   vec2 result;
    float ftime= mod(time*0.5, 9.0);
    
    for (int i = 0; i < notes.length(); i++) {
        Note note = notes[i];
        float x = float(i) * 1.0;
        if (ftime > note.offset) 
        { result += noteFreq(note, ftime);  }
    }
    return result*0.135;
}
